scripts.generate: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp .openapi-generator-ignore dist/ && npx openapi-generator-cli generate -i charger_spots.yml -g dart -t template/ -o dist/ && find dist/lib/model -type f | sed -E 's=.+/(.+).dart=\1=g' | xargs -I {} sh -c "sed -i '' s:FILE_NAME:{}:g dist/lib/model/{}.dart && echo export \'./model/{}.dart\'\; >> dist/lib/models.dart"
